paramInformation.label: Switch Type for Relay 1 (Sw1)
paramInformation.description: Choose the wall switch type you want to connect to the Sw1 terminal.

options.label: Garage door (momentary mode for Z-Wave control)

paramInformation.label: Switch Type for Relay 2 (Sw2)
paramInformation.description: Choose the wall switch type you want to connect to the Sw2 terminal.

options.label: Garage door (momentary mode for Z-Wave control)

paramInformation.label: Switch Type for Relay 3 (Sw3)
paramInformation.description: Choose the wall switch type you want to connect to the Sw3 terminal.

options.label: Garage door (momentary mode for Z-Wave control)

paramInformation.label: LED Indicator Control
paramInformation.description: Choose the LED indicator behavior

options.label: On when all relays are off
On when any relays is on

paramInformation.label: Auto Turn-Off Timer for Relay 1
paramInformation.description: Sets the time after which you want relay 1 to automatically turn off once it has been turned on, using the unit defined in parameter 15.

paramInformation.label: Auto Turn-On Timer for Relay 1
paramInformation.description: Sets the time after which you want relay 1 to automatically turn off once it has been turned on, using the unit defined in parameter 16.

paramInformation.label: Auto Turn-Off Timer for Relay 2
paramInformation.description: Sets the time after which you want relay 1 to automatically turn off once it has been turned on, using the unit defined in parameter 17.

paramInformation.label: Auto Turn-On Timer for Relay 2
paramInformation.description: Sets the time after which you want relay 1 to automatically turn off once it has been turned on, using the unit defined in parameter 18.

paramInformation.label: Auto Turn-Off Timer for Relay 3
paramInformation.description: Sets the time after which you want relay 1 to automatically turn off once it has been turned on, using the unit defined in parameter 19.

paramInformation.label: Auto Turn-On Timer for Relay 3
paramInformation.description: Sets the time after which you want relay 1 to automatically turn off once it has been turned on, using the unit defined in parameter 20.

paramInformation.label: Enable/Disable Manual Control for SW1
paramInformation.description: Determine whether you can control the indicated switch manually.

options.label: Local control disabled with enable on/off reports

paramInformation.label: Enable/Disable Manual Control for SW2
paramInformation.description: Determine whether you can control the indicated switch manually.

options.label: Local control disabled with enable on/off reports

paramInformation.label: Enable/Disable Manual Control for SW3
paramInformation.description: Determine whether you can control the indicated switch manually.

options.label: Local control disabled with enable on/off reports

paramInformation.label: Auto Turn-Off Timer Unit for Relay 1
paramInformation.description: Choose between second, minutes, and hours as the unit for Auto Turn-Off time for Relay 1.

paramInformation.label: Auto Turn-On Timer Unit for Relay 1
paramInformation.description: Choose between second, minutes, and hours as the unit for Auto Turn-On time for Relay 1.

paramInformation.label: Auto Turn-Off Timer Unit for Relay 2
paramInformation.description: Choose between second, minutes, and hours as the unit for Auto Turn-Off time for Relay 2.  Default: minutes

paramInformation.label: Auto Turn-On Timer Unit for Relay 2
paramInformation.description: Choose between second, minutes, and hours as the unit for Auto Turn-On time for Relay 2.

paramInformation.label: Auto Turn-Off Timer Unit for Relay 3
paramInformation.description: Choose between second, minutes, and hours as the unit for Auto Turn-Off time for Relay 3.

paramInformation.label: Auto Turn-On Timer Unit for Relay 3
paramInformation.description: Choose between second, minutes, and hours as the unit for Auto Turn-On time for Relay 3.

paramInformation.label: Normally open/close state for Relay 1
paramInformation.description: Decide whether you'd like Relay 1 to be normally open (NO) or normally closed (NC).

options.label: Normally open (reports off when switch is off / on when switch is on)
Normally closed (reports off when is on / on when switch is off)
Normally closed (reports off when switch is off / on when switch is on)

paramInformation.label: Normally open/close state for Relay 2
paramInformation.description: Decide whether you'd like Relay 2 to be normally open (NO) or normally closed (NC).

options.label: Normally open (reports off when switch is off / on when switch is on)
Normally closed (reports off when is on / on when switch is off)
Normally closed (reports off when switch is off / on when switch is on)

paramInformation.label: Normally open/close state for Relay 3
paramInformation.description: Decide whether you'd like Relay 3 to be normally open (NO) or normally closed (NC).

options.label: Normally open (reports off when switch is off / on when switch is on)
Normally closed (reports off when is on / on when switch is off)
Normally closed (reports off when switch is off / on when switch is on)

paramInformation.label: DC Motor Mode
paramInformation.description: When enabled only one relay may be on at a time, the other relay is automatically turned off.
